ABOUT ME

Let me introduce myself

YOUR PROJECT IN GOOD HANDS

My name is Miłosz Topolewski, but due to the difficult pronunciation, some people call me Milos. I come from Poland and my life is connected with two cities - Poznań and Rypin.

I graduated from Poznan Univeristy of Technology (PUT) in the field of Automatic Control and Robotics - here I had the opportunity to improve my knowledge of mathematics and programming. I have been interested in web programming for several years. I work with the latest technologies, so I observe with interest how the standards in terms of programming, design and SEO are constantly changing.

I set up my own company because I want to have full control over how the work on projects is going - with an emphasis not only on technical matters but also on the interesting appearance and functionality of the website.

In my spare time, I play guitar and read books - my favorite is 'Meditations - Thoughts to Myself' by Marcus Aurelius.

TECHNICAL SKILLS

Description of my specialization

HTML5

CSS3

JavaScript

WordPress

WooCommerce

SEO

HTML5

The page content is saved as HTML - it's necessary component in creating every website. Rank in Google is heavily dependent on HTML code, so it's good to have SEO knowledge when creating it.

CSS3

When HTML determines what is on a webpage, CSS determines how it looks like. It depends on the CSS code whether the website will work on mobile devices and how pleasant it is to use.

JavaScript

JavaScript is used to create additional, more complex functionalities.

WordPress

Wordpress is the most popular Content Management System (CMS). This is a great solution for people who want to add content to their website without programming knowledge.

WooCommerce

WooCommerce is an extension to WordPress - it allows you to run an online store. This is one of the most popular and best e-commerce solutions.

SEO

If you want to have your website, it means that you want to share something interesting with the world - Search Engine Optimization (SEO) will allow you to attract people interested in what you offer.
